body:
Link and md5 correct in package.py, .... but debug shows incorrect path during install:

```python
homepage = "https://github.com/luaposix/luaposix/"
url      = "https://github.com/luaposix/luaposix/archive/release-v33.4.0.tar.gz"

version('33.4.0', 'b36ff049095f28752caeb0b46144516c')
```
```
==> Fetching from https://github.com/luaposix/luaposix/archive/33.4.0.tar.gz failed.
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://github.com/luaposix/luaposix/archive/33.4.0.tar.gz
    URL https://github.com/luaposix/luaposix/archive/33.4.0.tar.gz was not found!
```
title: luaposix (lmod) fetch error
